paragraphs.text:
%spark
import org.bdgenomics.adam.io._
import org.apache.hadoop.io.Text
import se.uu.it.mare._

// Read and interlace dataset
val fr = sc.newAPIHadoopFile(
    "s3n://gatk-test-data/wgs_fastq/NA12878_20k/*_1*",
    classOf[SingleFastqInputFormat],
    classOf[Void],
    classOf[Text]
).map(_._2.toString)
val rr = sc.newAPIHadoopFile(
    "s3n://gatk-test-data/wgs_fastq/NA12878_20k/*_2*",
    classOf[SingleFastqInputFormat],
    classOf[Void],
    classOf[Text]
).map(_._2.toString)
val inputData = fr.zip(rr).map { case(fr,rr) => fr+rr.dropRight(1) }.repartition(4)

// Run MaRe
val res = new MaRe(inputData).map(
    inputMountPoint = TextFile("/chunk.fastq"),
    outputMountPoint = TextFile("/aln.sam"),
    imageName = "mcapuccini/alignment:latest",
    command =
        """
        set -e
        reference_genome=/ref/human_g1k_v37.fasta
        reads=/chunk.fastq
        bwa mem -t 8 -p $reference_genome $reads | samtools view > /aln.sam
        """
).repartition(1).map(
    inputMountPoint = TextFile("/aln.sam"),
    outputMountPoint = BinaryFiles("/results"),
    imageName = "mcapuccini/alignment:latest",
    command =
        """
        set -e
        cat /ref/human_g1k_v37.dict /aln.sam > /aln.header.sam
        UUID=$(cat /proc/sys/kernel/random/uuid)
        gatk AddOrReplaceReadGroups --INPUT=/aln.header.sam \
            --OUTPUT=/aln.header.sorted.rg.bam \
            --SORT_ORDER=coordinate --RGID=HG02666-id \
            --RGLB=HG02666-lib \
            --RGPL=ILLUMINA \
            --RGPU=HG02666-01 \
            --RGSM=HG02666
        gatk BuildBamIndex --INPUT=/aln.header.sorted.rg.bam
        
        reference_genome=/ref/human_g1k_v37.fasta
        gatk HaplotypeCallerSpark -R $reference_genome -I /aln.header.sorted.rg.bam -O /results/aln.${UUID}.g.vcf
        gzip /results/*
        """
).reduce(
    inputMountPoint = BinaryFiles("/in"),
    outputMountPoint = BinaryFiles("/out"),
    imageName = "opengenomics/vcftools-tools:latest",
    command =
        """
        set -e
        UUID=$(cat /proc/sys/kernel/random/uuid)
        vcf-concat /in/*.vcf.gz | gzip -c > /out/results.${UUID}.g.vcf.gz
        """
).map(
    inputMountPoint = BinaryFiles("/in"),
    outputMountPoint = TextFile("/out.tsv"),
    imageName = "mcapuccini/alignment:latest",
    command =
        """
        set -e
        gunzip /in/*.gz
        gatk VariantsToTable -V /in/*.vcf -O /out.hdr.tsv -F CHROM -F POS
        tail -n +2 /out.hdr.tsv > /out.tsv
        """
).rdd.map(_.split("\t"))

// Create dataframe
case class SNP(chr: String, pos: String)
res.map{case Array(chr, str) => SNP(chr, str)}.toDF.cache.createOrReplaceTempView("snp")

%sql
SELECT chr, count(*) FROM snp GROUP BY chr ORDER BY chr
